descriptions: The student does not demonstrate understanding of figurative language and cannot identify figures of speech.
The student struggles to identify and interpret figurative language, showing limited understanding.
The student identifies some figures of speech but has difficulty interpreting their meaning in context.
The student can generally interpret figures of speech but may miss subtle nuances or complexities.
The student demonstrates a strong understanding of figurative language, accurately interpreting most figures of speech in context.
The student expertly interprets figures of speech, including complex examples, and demonstrates a nuanced understanding of their effect.
The student does not recognize relationships between words and cannot use them to understand word meanings.
The student struggles to identify relationships between words, hindering their understanding of word meanings.
The student identifies some word relationships but struggles to apply them to understand word meanings.
The student generally uses word relationships to understand word meanings but may miss subtle connections.
The student effectively uses word relationships to enhance their understanding of word meanings.
The student expertly leverages word relationships to demonstrate a sophisticated understanding of word meanings.
The student does not differentiate between connotations of words with similar denotations.
The student struggles to distinguish between connotations, showing limited awareness of subtle differences in meaning.
The student identifies some differences in connotation but struggles to articulate the nuances.
The student generally distinguishes between connotations but may not fully grasp the subtle implications.
The student accurately distinguishes between the connotations of words with similar denotations.
The student expertly differentiates between connotations, demonstrating a nuanced understanding of their impact on meaning and tone.
